Speech recognitionÂ¶

Speech recognition is a very important part of the Aurora project. We have tried the following libraries for speech recognition:

  • Google Cloud Speech

  • CMU Sphinx

Now our application is still not developed enough to decide which of them better suits our needs. Further tests are required.
